## Update Protocol

When adding/removing primitives:

1. âœ… Update this file (`.github/PRIMITIVES_COUNT.md`)
2. âœ… Update `package.json` "description" field
3. âœ… Update `README.md` header and "What's Included" section
4. âœ… Update `al-development.md` header and primitives list
5. âœ… Update `CHANGELOG.md` with version changes
6. âœ… Update `docs/index.md` (mirrors README.md)
7. âœ… Run `npm run validate` to verify structure
8. âœ… Update `instructions/copilot-instructions.md` if needed
